panels.content:
## Presentation
-----
Welcome to my dashboard!

Ensure to update your grafana to the version 7.0.1 or more. Previous version won't have everything working properly.

If you face any issue to understand a panel or to know what to do, make sure to read the small note on the corner top left of the panel if there is one!


## Fiat converter
-----
The currency converter allow you to see the earning for one of the currency in the dropdown list.
The value `All` equals to `ETH`. To have access to the currency converter, you can find how in this [guide](https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/monitoring/currency-converter/)

   
You can get the currencies you want, but the currency correctly displayed in the earning panels are:
`BTC, CHF, CAD, EUR, USD, JPY, GBP`  
If you want to display correctly another currency that the one in the previous list, you can create a [git issue](https://github.com/GuillaumeMiralles/prysm-grafana-dashboard/issues) or you can DM me on discord (**Ocaa/grums** in prysm discord)

## Earning panels exceptions
-----
The earning panels are supposing that you have done deposits of 32 ETH exactly. If you see some incoherence in this values it's probably because you have deposited more than 32 ETH.
If so, you can fix the total earning panel by adding at the end of the query the substraction of your excedend 32 ETH. For the others earning panels (hourly daily weekly monthly),
it will be fixed by itself with time, but you can still fix it temporarily by doing the same job than on the total earning panel (then don't forget to remove your temporarily fix once it has been fixed automatically)

##### Total earning fix
-----
If you sent 32.5 ETH on each validator and you have 5 validators, the total earning query will look like
```
sum(validator_balance) - count(validator_balance > 16 and validator_statuses == 3)*32 - 0.5*5
```

To edit a panel, left click on the panel title then chose edit, then ensure to save the dashboard !


## Support
-----
If you enjoy the dashboard and you want to tip me for the work, you can send ETH and ERC20 token at this address **0xbDf75af14F356c381eC63329a4aB1C55D5c13fc5**



## Bug
-----
If you find a bug, please report it to me. You can create a [git issue](https://github.com/GuillaumeMiralles/prysm-grafana-dashboard/issues) or you can DM me on discord (Ocaa/grums in prysm discord)
Thanks for all the reports

 

After reading it, you can now delete me. And don't forget to save the dashboard after deleting me! (button on the upper right) :)

Enjoy
panels.description: To delete this panel: left click on the title, then chose remove
panels.title: README

panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last hour, and the annualized % of the hourly earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one hour old, or that you started prometheus at least one hour ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Hourly earning

panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last day, and the annualized % of the daily earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one day old, or that you started prometheus at least one day ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Daily earning

panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last week, and the annualized % of the weekly earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one week old, or that you started prometheus at least one week ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Weekly earning

panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last month, and the annualized % of the monthly earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one month old, or that you started prometheus at least one month ago. Ensure to run Prometheus with the flag `--storage.tsdb.retention.time=31d` if you want this panel to get enough data

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Monthly earning

panels.description: This panel will count only the votes done since your validator process started
panels.title: Validator vote summary

panels.description:
This graph is made for trading purpose mostly.
Supposing that if a lot of validators are exiting, price is gonna dump.

Also this can prevent to exit while exiting queue is too long, same for depositing while pending queue is too long.
panels.title: Balance validators status and participation rate

panels.description: This panel won't have consistant values during the first hour of the node started process
panels.title: Hourly log type counter

alert.message: One of the two process just restarted.
alert.name: WARN NODE/VALIDATOR: The process just restarted

panels.description:
This alert is useful only for people who has automatic restart of the process after crash. 
This can be made for example by using the prysm.bat file on windows with "set PRYSM_AUTORESTART=true&", or with docker with "--restart always"
panels.title: Warn: The process just restarted

alert.message: NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 SLOTS BEHIND THAN THE CHAIN
alert.name: NODE: 50 slots behind

alert.message: NODE/VALIDATOR: THE NODE OR VALIDATOR IS DOWN FOR MORE THAN 1 MINUTE
alert.name: NODE/VALIDATOR: Process down

alert.message: VALIDATOR ALERT: THE EARNING IN THE LAST HOUR IS LESS THAN 0
alert.name: VALIDATOR: Hourly earning <= 0

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance) - sum(validator_balance offset 1h) - count(validator_balance > 16)*32 + count(validator_balance offset 1h > 0)*32

alert.message: NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 ERRORS OR 100 WARNINGS IN THE LAST HOUR
alert.name: NODE: 50 errors  or 100 warns in 1h

alert.message: VALIDATOR ALERT: YOUR VALIDATOR HAS BEEN SLASHED
alert.name: VALIDATOR: Validator has been slashed

alert.message: NETWORK ALERT: THE PARTICIPATION RATE IS BELOW 66%! You won't get any reward until the participation rate rise up above 66% again. This alert doesn't require any action from you
alert.name: NETWORK: Participation rate below 66%
